testsuite.test:
showNotification simple
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did you see a notification with 1) headline 'Hello headline' and 2) the message telling you something nice?

showNotification two lines
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did you see a notification, with 1) the headline and 2) a TWO LINE message?

showNotification callback
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'! 2) Confirm the notification.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

showNotification Missing params
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

openURL simply open a site
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the browser open?

openURL invalid URL as param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the browser open?

setPreferenceForKey preferenceForKey Verify that get returns what set did
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey preferenceForKey Check for old params order If this test fails the old params order for setPreferenceForKey is implemented
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey Verify that return value is undefined
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey Set a preference string using all characters from char 1 through char 255 and verify them
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

setPreferenceForKey Store 1024 characters
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
